content: a classic crochet scarf pattern with fringe skills knowledge of basic crochet stitches techniques and terminology is assumed the pattern is worked in long row changing colour at the end of each row chainless foundation stitches foundation single and double_crochet - us terms are used to start the scarf the rest of the pattern is worked using us single and double_crochet materials the pattern uses a 4 5mm crochet hook and around 300g of sport weight yarn in 2 colours the item pictured used the following yarn approximately 300g / 990m happy sheep baby wool from hobbii 100% merino wool 50g ball = 165m / 180yds yarn a 3 x 50g balls black shade 05 yarn b 3 x 50g balls white shade 02 i used approximately 20g more of yarn a than yarn b my finished scarf weighed around 275g and used approx 910m in total size this scarf is intended for use by adults only and sized as such the finished scarf measures around 165cm long by 27cm wide unblocked this excludes the fringe which adds about 8cm at either end the pattern is written in english using us crochet terms and is delivered via pdf download copyright dora does 2022 the pattern is for personal use and may not be reproduced or shared without written consent
